00026     string CFGNode::id() const {
00027         ostringstream s;
00028         s << "n_" << hex << uintptr_t(node) << "_" << dec ;
00029         return s.str();
00030     }

00036     string CFGEdge::toStringForDebugging() const {
00037         ostringstream s;
00038         // s << src.id() << " -> " << tgt.id();
00039         bool anyNonEmpty = false;
00040         EdgeConditionKind cond = condition();
00041         if (cond != eckUnconditional) {
00042             if (anyNonEmpty) s << " "; // For consistency
00043             s << "key(";
00044             switch (cond) {
00045                 case eckTrue:
00046                     s << "true";
00047                     break;
00048                 case eckFalse:
00049                     s << "false";
00050                     break;
00051                 case eckCaseLabel:
00052                     // s << caseLabel()->unparseToString();
00053                     break;
00054                 case eckDefault:
00055                     s << "default";
00056                     break;
00057                 default:
00058                     s << "unknown";
00059                     break;
00060             }
00061             s << ")";
00062             anyNonEmpty = true;
00063         }
00064         return s.str();
00065     }

00067     string CFGEdge::id() const {
00068         ostringstream s;
00069         s << src.id() << "__" << tgt.id();
00070         return s.str();
00071     }

00074     EdgeConditionKind CFGEdge::condition() const {
00075 #if 0
00076         SgAsmNode* srcNode = src.getNode();
00077         unsigned int srcIndex = src.getIndex();
00078         SgAsmNode* tgtNode = tgt.getNode();
00079         unsigned int tgtIndex = tgt.getIndex();
00080         if (isSgAsmMov(srcNode) ) {
00081             SgAsmMov* ifs = isSgAsmMov(srcNode);
00082 #if 0
00083             if (ifs->get_true_body() == tgtNode) {
00084                 return eckTrue;
00085             } else if (ifs->get_false_body() == tgtNode) {
00086                 return eckFalse;
00087             } else ROSE_ASSERT (!"Bad successor in if statement");
00088 #endif
00089         }
00090 #if 0
00091         else if (isSgWhileStmt(srcNode) && srcIndex == 1) {
00092             if (srcNode == tgtNode) {
00093                 // False case for while test
00094                 return eckFalse;
00095             } else {
00096                 return eckTrue;
00097             }
00098         } else if (isSgDoWhileStmt(srcNode) && srcIndex == 2) {
00099             // tgtIndex values are 0 for true branch and 3 for false branch
00100             if (tgtIndex == 0) {
00101                 return eckTrue;
00102             } else {
00103                 return eckFalse;
00104             }
00105         } else if (isSgForStatement(srcNode) && srcIndex == 2) {
00106             if (srcNode == tgtNode) {
00107                 // False case for test
00108                 return eckFalse;
00109             } else {
00110                 return eckTrue;
00111             }
00112         } else if (isSgSwitchStatement(srcNode) && isSgCaseOptionStmt(tgtNode)) {
00113             return eckCaseLabel;
00114         } else if (isSgSwitchStatement(srcNode) && isSgDefaultOptionStmt(tgtNode)){
00115             return eckDefault;
00116         } else if (isSgConditionalExp(srcNode) && srcIndex == 1) {
00117             SgConditionalExp* ce = isSgConditionalExp(srcNode);
00118             if (ce->get_true_exp() == tgtNode) {
00119                 return eckTrue;
00120             } else if (ce->get_false_exp() == tgtNode) {
00121                 return eckFalse;
00122             } else ROSE_ASSERT (!"Bad successor in conditional expression");
00123         } else if (isSgAndOp(srcNode) && srcIndex == 1) {
00124             if (srcNode == tgtNode) {
00125                 // Short-circuited false case
00126                 return eckFalse;
00127             } else {
00128                 return eckTrue;
00129             }
00130         } else if (isSgOrOp(srcNode) && srcIndex == 1) {
00131             if (srcNode == tgtNode) {
00132                 // Short-circuited true case
00133                 return eckTrue;
00134             } else {
00135                 return eckFalse;
00136             }
00137         } 
00138 #endif
00139         else {
00140             // No key
00141             return eckUnconditional;
00142         }
00143 #else
00144     // DQ (11/28/2009): This function was already commented out, but must return a value for use in MSVC.
00145        return eckFalse;
00146 #endif
00147     }

00150     void makeEdge(SgAsmInstruction* from, SgAsmInstruction* to, const AuxiliaryInformation* info, vector<CFGEdge>& result) {
00151 #if 0
00152         SgAsmNode* fromNode = from.getNode();
00153         unsigned int fromIndex = from.getIndex();
00154         SgAsmNode* toNode = to.getNode();
00155         unsigned int toIndex = to.getIndex();
00156 #if 0
00157         // Exit early if the edge should not exist because of a control flow discontinuity
00158         if (fromIndex == 1 && (isSgGotoStatement(fromNode) || isSgBreakStmt(fromNode) || isSgContinueStmt(fromNode))) {
00159             return;
00160         }
00161         if (isSgReturnStmt(fromNode) && toNode == fromNode->get_parent()) {
00162             SgReturnStmt* rs = isSgReturnStmt(fromNode);
00163             if (fromIndex == 1 || fromIndex == 0 && !rs->get_expression()) return;
00164         }
00165         if (fromIndex == 1 && isSgSwitchStatement(fromNode) &&
00166             isSgSwitchStatement(fromNode)->get_body() == toNode) return;
00167 #endif
00168 #endif
00169         // Create the edge
00170         result.push_back(CFGEdge(CFGNode(from, info), CFGNode(to, info), info));
00171     }

00173     vector<CFGEdge> CFGNode::outEdges() const {
00174         ROSE_ASSERT (node);
00175         return node->cfgBinOutEdges(info);
00176     }

00178     vector<CFGEdge> CFGNode::inEdges() const {
00179         ROSE_ASSERT (node);
00180         return node->cfgBinInEdges(info);

00183     const std::set<uint64_t>& AuxiliaryInformation::getPossibleSuccessors(SgAsmInstruction* insn) const {
00184         static const std::set<uint64_t> emptySet;
00185         std::map<SgAsmInstruction*, std::set<uint64_t> >::const_iterator succsIter = indirectJumpTargets.find(insn);
00186         if (isSgAsmx86Instruction(insn) && isSgAsmx86Instruction(insn)->get_kind() == x86_ret) {
00187             SgNode* f = insn;
00188             while (f && !isSgAsmBlock(f) && !isSgAsmFunction(f)) f = f->get_parent();
00189             std::map<SgAsmStatement*, std::set<uint64_t> >::const_iterator retIter = returnTargets.find(isSgAsmStatement(f));
00190             if (retIter == returnTargets.end()) {
00191                 return emptySet;
00192             } else {
00193                 return retIter->second;
00194             }
00195         } else if (succsIter == indirectJumpTargets.end()) {
00196             return emptySet;
00197         } else {
00198             // rose translator has trouble in unparsing it correctly.
00199             return succsIter->second;
00200         }
00201     }

00203     AuxiliaryInformation::AuxiliaryInformation(SgNode* top)
00204         : addressToInstructionMap(), indirectJumpTargets(), returnTargets(), incomingEdges()
00205     {
00206 
00207         struct AuxInfoTraversal: public AstSimpleProcessing {
00208             AuxiliaryInformation* info;
00209             AuxInfoTraversal(AuxiliaryInformation* info): info(info) {}
00210             virtual void visit(SgNode* n) {
00211                 SgAsmInstruction* insn = isSgAsmInstruction(n);
00212                 if (!insn) return;
00213                 info->addressToInstructionMap[insn->get_address()] = insn;
00214             }
00215         };
00216 
00217         struct AuxInfoTraversal2: public AstSimpleProcessing {
00218             AuxiliaryInformation* info;
00219             AuxInfoTraversal2(AuxiliaryInformation* info): info(info) {}
00220             virtual void visit(SgNode* n) {
00221                 SgAsmx86Instruction* insn = isSgAsmx86Instruction(n);
00222                 if (!insn) return;
00223                 if (insn->get_kind() != x86_call) return;
00224                 //cerr << "Found call xxx at " << hex << insn->get_address() << endl;
00225                 uint64_t tgtAddr;
00226                 if (!x86GetKnownBranchTarget(insn, tgtAddr)) return;
00227                 //cerr << "Found call at " << hex << insn->get_address() << " with known target " << hex << tgtAddr << endl;
00228                 SgAsmInstruction* tgt = info->getInstructionAtAddress(tgtAddr);
00229                 if (!tgt) return;
00230                 //cerr << "Found target insn" << endl;
00231                 SgNode* f = tgt;
00232                 while (f && !isSgAsmBlock(f) && !isSgAsmFunction(f)) f = f->get_parent();
00233                 if (!f) return;
00234                 //cerr << "Found function of target" << endl;
00235                 uint64_t next = insn->get_address() + insn->get_raw_bytes().size();
00236                 info->returnTargets[isSgAsmStatement(f)].insert(next);
00237             }
00238         };
00239 
00240         struct AuxInfoTraversal3: public AstSimpleProcessing {
00241             AuxiliaryInformation* info;
00242             AuxInfoTraversal3(AuxiliaryInformation* info): info(info) {}
00243             virtual void visit(SgNode* n) {
00244                 SgAsmInstruction* insn = isSgAsmInstruction(n);
00245                 if (!insn) return;
00246                 vector<CFGEdge> outEdgesSoFar = insn->cfgBinOutEdges(info);
00247                 for (size_t i = 0; i < outEdgesSoFar.size(); ++i) {
00248                     info->incomingEdges[outEdgesSoFar[i].target().getNode()].insert(insn->get_address());
00249                 }
00250             }
00251         };
00252 
00253         AuxInfoTraversal trav(this);
00254         trav.traverse(top, preorder);
00255         AuxInfoTraversal2 trav2(this);
00256         trav2.traverse(top, preorder);
00257         AuxInfoTraversal3 trav3(this);
00258         trav3.traverse(top, preorder);
00259     }
